Frequently Asked Inquiries

Is my legal counsel... a ghost?

Yes. All our associates are non-corporeal entities, being different aspects of the same foundational consciousness. This provides a uniquely unified and unbiased legal strategy. They have all passed the Ethereal Bar Exam.

What are your billable hours if you don't experience time?

We bill in 'Units of Legal Exertion' (ULEs), which are pegged to the complexity of the case and the amount of metaphysical energy expended. A detailed ULE statement is provided upon request and can be audited by any certified chronomancer.

Do you take cases against the living?

Of course. We find cases where one party is corporeal to be refreshingly straightforward. Please note that our standard methods of discovery may be considered... unorthodox.

How does attorney-client privilege work across dimensions?

All communications are encrypted via a quantum-entangled psychic link. This privilege is absolute and extends to all known planes of existence, alternate timelines, and dream-states.²

² Does not apply in pocket dimensions where causality is inverted.
